xbel.title: Pyhoo!
xbel.desc: This is a collection of useful pointers to Python-related material of various sorts. It grew out of my personal bookmarks collection, and is now maintained in XBEL, the XML Bookmark Exchange Language, partly as an experiment, partly as a demo for xmlproc and partly as a service for the public and myself.

bookmark.title: Introduction pointers @ python.org
bookmark.desc: A set of pointers to Python introductions.

bookmark.title: Comparisons of Python and other languages
The Quick Python Book
bookmark.desc: An online draft of an upcoming Python tutorial book by Ken McDonald.

bookmark.title: Python: It's not just for laughs
bookmark.desc: An article in WebReview about Python.

bookmark.title: Python 1.5 Quick Reference
bookmark.desc: A very concise and useful reference of Python minutiae.

bookmark.title: Python Performance Tips
bookmark.desc: Some hints on which style and constructs to use to achieve the best Python performance.
